item.title: Game city of stalkers
item.description: In this game you will have to experience all the “charms” of the post-apocalyptic world. You have to fight with crowds of mutants who have captured vast territories. By attacking monsters, you can work together with other players or defy fate alone. You can create your own server and play with friends.

item.title: Game Stalker Gas Sector
item.description: Fantastic shooter with RPG elements about the adventures of a stalker in the exclusion zone around the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. You have to complete several difficult tasks, making your way through the abandoned territory. But be careful, there are a lot of mutants and artifact hunters around. Keep your weapons ready and don’t relax.

item.title: Game Stalker in the air
item.description: Today you have the opportunity to sit in the cockpit and complete several tasks to destroy the enemy. You have to fight enemy fighters, destroy ground targets and follow other instructions from the command. Use the mouse to control. Left button - fire at the enemy.
